data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Kozhikode, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kozhikode, Kerala, India

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Kozhikode prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Kozhikode.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Kozhikode, Kerala, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Mukkari people.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Kozhikode.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Kozhikode to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Kozhikode, Kerala, India to the gospel today.

location.name: Kozhikode
location.people_groups_list: Badaga, Vallon, Viswakarma Kallan Muppan, Arasar, Eravallan
